name: Lunar Lander (itch) (CaptainD)
description:
Lunar Lander is a one-switch game where you try to land as gently as possible. If you manage, you start again from a higher height!

For some reason it was always at the back of my mind to make a Lunar Lander game, but I've also become fascinated by accessibility features in gaming, in particular one-switch games.  This game was a bit of an experiment to see if I could make a fun and challenging one-switch game, and it's not bad for a few goes.

Made this in 2017, but hadn't uploaded it to Itch before.
